songs.title: Paradox (Disciple’s Song)
songs.lyrics:
River of life flowing out from me
I don;t walk the ways of death no more
I listened to Jesus' voice and now i'm free
'Cause I took Jesus as my Lord

Listen children, Listen and choose
Before you can win you first must lose
Before you can gain you've got to give
You have to die in order to live

I heard Jesus calling soft and low
Turn from yourself and follow Me
Come follow me down the narrow road
Oh Lord, i'll go where 'ere You lead me

No man comes without counting the cost
Lest he find himself at greater loss
Whosoever will not take up His Cross
That man is not worthy of Him
